[Home](./index.md) &gt; [vm-providers](./vm-providers.md) &gt; [VM](./vm-providers.vm.md)

## VM interface

This interface is implemented by each virtual machine provider. It specifies the set of operations that can be done on a virtual machine, including sending keyboard and mouse events and destroying the virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VM 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [tcpRedirections](./vm-providers.vm.tcpredirections.md) | readonly [PortRedirection](./vm-providers.portredirection.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Contains an array of TCP port redirections that are usable. Especially, all ports specified in [VMConfig.redirectTCPPorts](./vm-providers.vmconfig.redirecttcpports.md) when calling the virtual machine factory should have a corresponding entry in this array. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [destroy()](./vm-providers.vm.destroy.md) | Stops and destroys the virtual machine. |
|  [sendKeyDownEvent(key)](./vm-providers.vm.sendkeydownevent.md) | Sends a keydown event to the virtual machine. |
|  [sendKeyUpEvent(key)](./vm-providers.vm.sendkeyupevent.md) | Sends a keyup event to the virtual machine. |
|  [sendMouseDownEvent(button)](./vm-providers.vm.sendmousedownevent.md) | Sends a mousedown event to the virtual machine. |
|  [sendMouseMoveEvent(position)](./vm-providers.vm.sendmousemoveevent.md) | Sends an absolute mousemove event to the virtual machine. |
|  [sendMouseUpEvent(button)](./vm-providers.vm.sendmouseupevent.md) | Sends a mouseup event to the virtual machine. |
|  [takePNGScreenshot()](./vm-providers.vm.takepngscreenshot.md) | Takes a screenshot of the virtual machine and returns the corresponding PNG image. |
